title: Genomics Observatory use-case: the challenge to standardise image and sequence data to Darwin Core format. Biodiversity Information Science and Standards 4
text: Exter, Katrina, et al. Genomics Observatory Use-Case: the challenge to standardise image and sequence data to Darwin Core format.Biodiversity Information Science and Standards 4 (2020): e58938

title: A Marine Biodiversity Observation Network for Genetic Monitoring of Hard-Bottom Communities (ARMS-MBON)
text: Obst, Matthias, et al. A marine biodiversity observation network for genetic monitoring of hard-bottom communities (ARMS-MBON). Frontiers in Marine Science 7 (2020): 572680.

title: The bone in the bone
text: Spooky scary skeletons send shivers down your spine. Shrieking skulls will shock your soul, seal your doom tonight.

title: The eel in the seal caught the whale in the mail
text: The eel in the seal caught the whale in the mail. The whale in the mail was a very big whale.
